***Always refer to an incentive protocol developed by the project team when processing incentives for qualitative methods.***

- Gather repeated names of focus group registration as participants may have the same first or last name or join via a friend/connectionâ€™s Zoom link.  Keep the name/email/attendance record in the same row in a tracking spreadsheet. 

- Have separate lines for Name, Address, Address 2 (apartment/unit number), City, State, and Zip in an online form of contact information. Prompt people to include their apartment or unit number in the directions.

  - This makes mail merging with many responses much easier when processing physical gift cards and helps prevent mail from bouncing back to us.

- Please be aware of the specific challenges/benefits of the administration method and the vendor you're working with (e.g., physical vs. e-gift card; Amazon vs. Kroger vs. Visa [which carries a $5 activation fee]; etc.).
  - NOTE: To avoid online scammers, you may wish to limit your options to physical gift cards, as they require a mailing address. By contrast, e-gift cards only require a valid email address, and scammers have sophisticated methods for creating multiple email addresses.
